title: Chargers, Joey Bosa reach record extension, 2020 Breakout Defenses (Football 7/30)
description:
Joey Bosa just got way richer. The Chargers and their star reached a record contract extension on Tuesday that locks up Bosa in Los Angeles for the future. Bryant McFadden joins host Will Brinson to break down the deal and why it's well worth it for both sides (2:00). BMac and Brinson also discuss defenses that they expect to break out in 2020. The Chargers could very well be one of them! Bryant is also super high on the Broncos (21:00) and Colts (28:00) and tosses in a few more sleeper options (35:30).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
